common.messages

类 MetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.messages.MetaData

  • public class MetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    MetaData contains a circle of server nodes whose order is determined by it's hash value
    作者：
    Jeff

    • 字段摘要

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and 描述
      private java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> circle
      Circle is the form of MetaData, whose every server node takes address as its value and address's corresponding MD5 as its key.

    • 构造方法摘要

      Constructors 
      Constructor and 描述
      MetaData() 
      MetaData(java.lang.String constructStr)
      Constructor Construct input string (from byte array) to an instance of MetaData.

    • 方法摘要

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and 描述
      void add(java.lang.String address)
      According to a new activated server's address, add this server node to circle.
      java.lang.String byteArrayToHex(byte[] byteArray)
      From byte array to Hex-string
      java.lang.String computeMd5(java.lang.String k)
      Get the md5 of the given key.
      java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)
      The given key is from a new object, decides which server node it belongs to and returns the address of this server node.
      java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCircle()
      Get circle of the MetaData.
      void remove(java.lang.String address)
      Remove a server node according to its address.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • 字段详细信息

      • circle

        private java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> circle
        Circle is the form of MetaData, whose every server node takes address as its value and address's corresponding MD5 as its key.

    • 构造方法详细信息

      • MetaData

        public MetaData()

      • MetaData

        public MetaData(java.lang.String constructStr)
        Constructor Construct input string (from byte array) to an instance of MetaData. Or constructed by ECS.
        参数：
        constructStr - Format: hashValue ip:port hashValue2 ip:port ......

    • 方法详细信息

        Get the md5 of the given key.
        参数：
        k -
        返回：
        md5 in the form of Hex-string

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String address)
        According to a new activated server's address, add this server node to circle.
        参数：
        address -

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String address)
        Remove a server node according to its address.
        参数：
        node -

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)
        The given key is from a new object, decides which server node it belongs to and returns the address of this server node.
        参数：
        key -
        返回：
        address

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        MetaDataToString, in order to transfer from servers.
        覆盖：
        toString 类 {1} 中的 {0} java.lang.Object
        参数：
        metaData -
        返回：
        circle of the metaData to string
